content:
We are a team of young professionals united by a shared passion for the electronics industry — especially its remarkable growth story in India. With backgrounds spanning product design, development, sourcing, sales, business strategy, marketing, and turnkey project execution, we've each played a part in shaping this vibrant sector.

Through our collective experience, we've witnessed the inner workings of the Electronics System Design & Manufacturing (ESDM) and Electronics Manufacturing Services (EMS) ecosystems. And along the way, one challenge consistently stood out — procurement.

Despite being a backbone of operations, procurement in this sector remains deeply fragmented and painfully inefficient. In India, especially, decision-makers still struggle with outdated sourcing practices, scattered product data, and a lack of reliable, organized information.

That's where PINGBHAI steps in. We're building a digital platform that brings clarity, speed, and intelligence to industrial procurement — all grounded in a simple philosophy: Smart research before purchase.

From clutter-free product discovery to clean interfaces, verified products, meaningful specifications, rich visuals, and AI-powered assistance — we're transforming how ESDM and EMS companies explore and evaluate products. No noise. Just insights.

This is more than just solving a problem. It's about empowering procurement professionals with tools that are not only smart and modern but refreshingly human-centric.

faqs.q: What is PINGBHAI, and how does it help me as a procurement professional?
faqs.a: PINGBHAI is a procurement intelligence platform built specifically for India's electronics design and manufacturing sector (ESDM & EMS). It simplifies your product research process by giving you access to simplified, verified, structured, and comparable product listings for equipment, consumables, and industrial software products.

faqs.q: What kind of products can I explore on PINGBHAI?
faqs.a: Electronics manufacturing equipment (including refurbished and second-hand options), factory consumables (e.g., soldering materials, adhesives, solvents), and software products for ESDM operations. Note: We do not list raw materials like semiconductors, base materials and other components.

faqs.q: How does PINGBHAI ensure the credibility of the listed products?
faqs.a: All product listings are verified by the PINGBHAI team. Manufacturers and suppliers provide detailed specifications, certifications (like BIS, RoHS etc), support capabilities, and client credentials of every product listed.

faqs.q: Can I compare products from different brands?
faqs.a: Yes. PINGBHAI presents product parameters like technical specs, key features, warranty terms, installation base, and country of origin — enabling side-by-side comparisons.

faqs.q: Does PINGBHAI sell the products directly?
faqs.a: No. PINGBHAI helps you discover the right-fit products and then connects you with our dedicated sales partner NEXTONIC SMT SOLUTIONS INDIA PVT LTD who handles quotations, negotiations, and deliveries.

faqs.q: How can I raise a product enquiry?
faqs.a: Each product listing includes a Get-quote option as well as a quick chat option. Once you raise a request, the sales partner NEXTONIC will respond with product-specific support and quotation details.

faqs.q: Are the suppliers and brands listed on PINGBHAI India-based?
faqs.a: Not necessarily. Many are global manufacturers and suppliers, but all listed sellers are authorized to supply to India and meet relevant import and compliance requirements.

faqs.q: Does the platform help with post-sale support?
faqs.a: Yes. The suppliers on PINGBHAI are bound by a Service Level Agreement (SLA) with Nextonic that ensures pre-sale and post-sale support, including warranty, service, and escalation paths.

faqs.q: Can I request a demo or sample?
faqs.a: In most cases, yes. Certain products allow demo or trial requests. These can be coordinated through Nextonic.

faqs.q: Is there a cost to use PINGBHAI as a buyer?
faqs.a: No. The platform is completely free to use. You can browse, compare, and enquire about products without any charges or subscription.

faqs.q: What is PINGBHAI?
faqs.a: PINGBHAI is a custom-made web & mobile based platform for Indian Electronics industry, developed and promoted by GEL MEDIA LLP and NEXTONIC SMT SOLUTIONS PVT LTD. It enables procurement decision-makers in electronics design and manufacturing companies to access simplified, structured, verified, and insightful information about equipment, consumables, and software products.

faqs.q: Who uses this platform?
faqs.a: Procurement heads, purchase managers, engineers/technical staff, and CXOs in Indian electronics design and manufacturing companies.

faqs.q: What are the benefits of listing my products?
faqs.a: Your products gain targeted visibility among qualified B2B buyers in the Indian Electronics Industry, helping increase inbound leads and accelerate sales opportunities without requiring you to set up your own marketing and sales infrastructure.

faqs.q: Is PINGBHAI involved in direct product sales?
faqs.a: No. PINGBHAI only facilitates procurement decisions through product insights and generates leads. Actual sales operations are carried out by NEXTONIC SMT SOLUTIONS INDIA PVT LTD.

faqs.q: How can I get onboarded?
faqs.a: Share your company and products information, sign a Manufacturer/Supplier Listing Agreement, and sign a Service Level Agreement (SLA) that outlines pre-sales and post-sales support responsibilities.

faqs.q: What product information do I need to provide?
faqs.a: Product names & model numbers, pricing details, description and pictures, country of make and warranty terms, detailed specifications and datasheets, client credentials, compliance & certification documentation, and support/service details.

faqs.q: What product categories can be listed?
faqs.a: Electronics manufacturing equipment (new, refurbished, second-hand), factory consumables (solder materials, adhesives, solvents, tapes), and industrial software products for ESDM industry.

faqs.q: Do I need an Indian office to list products?
faqs.a: No, but your company must be authorized to export to India and meet relevant regulatory standards (BIS, RoHS, CPCB, WPC, DPDP etc).

faqs.q: What quality and support commitments must I fulfill?
faqs.a: The SLA includes: timely responses during buyer evaluation, availability of authorized documentation for compliance, defined support levels post-sale including hotline and ticket response times, and warranty and escalation processes.

faqs.q: Can I update or remove products later?
faqs.a: Yes. Once onboarded, you can work with the PINGBHAI team to edit, replace, or remove product listings through a structured update process.

faqs.q: Is there a fee for listing products?
faqs.a: No. Listing is 100% free. Sales commercials need to be agreed with Nextonic in a separate contract. Premium features in future may have nominal charges.

faqs.q: What is the typical listing timeline?
faqs.a: Once agreements are signed and data is submitted, your products can be live within 7–10 business days.

content.description: The BGA Rework Station R6860 is a robust, semi-automatic solution for high-precision BGA (Ball Grid Array) rework across a wide range of applications—from PCB assembly and repair to sophisticated electronics production lines.

key_features.title: Three-Zone Heating System
key_features.details: Upper & lower hot air with bottom infrared (IR) control ensures even heating across the PCB. Independent temperature control with 8-segment profiles and ±1°C accuracy.

key_features.title: Precision Optical Alignment
key_features.details: High-definition CCD color camera + 15" HD monitor for real-time visibility. X/Y and rotate (R) axes micrometer fine-tuning accuracy to 0.01 mm. Automatic adjustment for color aberration and brightness.

key_features.title: Human-Friendly Touch Interface
key_features.details: Intuitive touchscreen control managing heating, alignment, and rework stages. Combines upper heating and mounting heads into a single 2-in-1 mechanism.

key_features.title: Advanced Safety & Access Control
key_features.details: Automatic alarm post-BGA heat cycle. Double over-temperature protection for added safety. Password-protected settings to prevent unauthorized changes.

applications: Reballing and chip replacement for mobile, laptop, TV, automotive, and industrial BGAs
Precision electronics repair, including motherboard and logic board rework
High-throughput BGA handling for production, prototyping, and R&D environments

technical_specs.heating_zones: Upper hot air, lower hot air, bottom IR
technical_specs.optical_feedback: HD CCD color camera with 15" monitor

benefits: High Precision: Camera-guided and micrometer alignment ensures optimal BGA placement and solder quality
